v8:item.v8:content: The report option this report option was saved from.
Brief report presentation. It is displayed in report panels.
The report option author or owner.
Visible in report panels by default

If selected, the report option is visible in report panels by default. Otherwise, the report option is hidden from all report panels. Users can customize this report option visibility in report panel settings.

Properties.Name: DefaultVisibilityOverridden
Properties.Comment: When True, the value of the same flag in the predefined report version is used instead of the visibility to Silence check box.

v8:item.v8:content: A internal attribute for predefined report options.
The unique key of the report option.
Specific and obsolete terminology. Looked up during the search.
An internal attribute. The full name of the metadata object used as the report option context.
Names of the report's parameters and filters. Looked up during the search.
Report field names. Looked up during the search.
Displayed in a report panel as a tooltip.
Displayed in a report panel as a tooltip.
Displayed in a report panel as a tooltip.

Properties.Name: Report
Properties.Comment: APK:1329-the table assumes few entries (in ERP ~ 1200) - optimization is not required

v8:item.v8:content: A reference to a report or a full name of an external report.
Report option type: If selected, Custom. Otherwise, Predefined.
Predefined report option with default settings.
Defines who can see the report option in the report panel: If selected, the report option is shown to the author only. Otherwise, the report option is shown to all users.
An internal field. Intended for application updates.
If the check box is cleared, the report is hidden from the group.
If the check box is selected, the report name is placed at the top of the group and shown in bold type.
If the check box is selected, the report is shown in the "See also" group at the bottom of the report panel.
